text: Ese inkuru za ba bandi bababanjirije ntizabagezeho, iz’abantu ba Nuhu, iz’aba Adi, iz’aba Thamudu ndetse n’iza ba bandi baje nyuma yabo? Nta wundi ubazi usibye Allah. Intumwa zabo zabazaniye ibimenyetso bigaragara, ariko bashyize intoki mu minwa yabo (baraziruma kubera uburakari), maze baravuga bati “Mu by’ukuri duhakanye ubutumwa mwazanye, kandi dushidikanya cyane ku byo muduhamagarira.”
